radiographic_examinations.findings: Initial exhaled carbon monoxide level was 21 ppm; after 7 weeks of continuous abstinence from smoking, carbon monoxide level increased to 25 ppm; consistently less than 3 ppm during follow-up visits.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Serum blood nicotine and cotinine level measurement
radiographic_examinations.findings: Serum blood nicotine level was 28 ng/ml and cotinine level was 337 ng/ml at the outset.
